item.title: Micklegate Arts Trail Launch (31st May 2025)
item.description:
The Micklegate Arts Trail is launching this Saturday 31st May!

You can see the work of 35 local artists in 20+ shops, restaurants, cafes and more all over Micklegate, York!

Chosen and hosted by the traders themselves, this is a true community event, devised by Navigators Art for the York Festival of Ideas. This year weâ€™ve added music, spoken word and art demonstrations in The Artful Dodger Bar, The Falcon and The Hooting Owl Distillery throughout the two weeks of the project.
